title: Daniels tops Zubac, Cunningham for NBA's MIP
description: Hawks guard Dyson Daniels finished comfortably ahead of fellow finalists Ivica Zubac and Cade Cunningham in the voting for the NBA's Most Improved Player award.

title: Belichick defends girlfriend from 'false narrative'
description: North Carolina coach Bill Belichick issued a statement defending girlfriend Jordon Hudson from the "false narrative" that she was trying to control his interview with CBS.
author: Jake Trotter

title: How Chelsea extended dynasty with latest WSL title
description: How Chelsea and Sonia Bompastor expanded their dynasty and secured a sixth successive Women's Super League title.

title: 'A talent that comes along every 50 years' - 'genius' Yamal steals show
description: Lamine Yamal says he would not compare himself to Lionel Messi - and then puts in a performance a 17-year-old Messi could only have dreamed of.

title: Ryan Watts issues a statement after his release: My journey is far from over
description: Steelers defensive back Ryan Watts injured his neck in the final preseason game against the Lions last summer.

title: On3 predicts LSU will land top in-state cornerback
description: LSU football is emerging as the top school for Louisiana four-star cornerback Heyward Howard. On3 logged a prediction for the Tigers on Wednesday.

title: Maddison: We're 100 per cent behind Ange
description: Tottenham midfielder James Maddison insists the team are "100 per cent behind" boss Ange Postecoglou despite their "unacceptable" Premier League season.

title: Forest owner Marinakis gives up control of club
description: Nottingham Forest owner Evangelos Marinakis has removed himself from control of the club by officially withdrawing his position at Companies House.
